children.value: This notebook demonstrates how an openEO job execution can be managed from Python.
early adopters account is necessary. Please obtain one via this link:

children.value:
import rasterio
from rasterio.plot import show

for path in downloaded_files:
    img = rasterio.open(path)
    show(img)
